title: Buffalo Nickel
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Organic, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Farm to Table restaurant with a separate vegan/vegetarian menu featuring a maple smoked tempeh entree and sandwich, buffalo cauliflower and cauliflower steak, vegan tempeh nachos with cashew queso. Weekly changing salad and soups.  Downstairs dining, upstairs billiards and bar. Holds live events.
